posts.post_content:
@ bushiyo I can't seem to get the math that would let you do all this in one turn. Even going second and having 8 cards to play with. Having 3 lands and those 5 cards, you will still only have 2 open mana to play with after playing fastbond. 'Play land, play Fastbond, play 2 more lands' then what? If you have 4 lands you can't have all those cards you mentioned. Now remove the Zuran Orb and it's possible, to get the Crcuible out but then you don't have a way to sac the lands.
  
   
@ Thorhauge
  
If you have the Crucible out already yes, but on turn one you would need it all to start with.
  
"Uktabi can be a round one killer with fastbond, crucible of worlds, zuran orb, and adventuring gear".

Posted By: Kryptnyt (5/15/2012 8:18:44 PM)

posts.post_content:
I feel the echo cost for this card is disgusting. Usually I'm hot and cold with this card. I try to use it in a blitz gameplay but to spend a combined 4 mana by round 3 for a 2/1 flyer is actually slow progress.  
If justification is that you'll boost or enchant it, then why not pick something without that pesky echo cost?  
If justification is that you have a method to accelerated mana by round 2, then why not simply play a heavier hitter? (since this means you generated 4 mana by round 2).  
Then again, a green flyer is valuable; I'm just not a big fan of its echo cost.  
Compared with the kinds of quality we've seen dropped in rounds 2 and 3, I'd be happy to see this drake in round 3.  
Again, for ex: if I have Fastbond, and especially if my deck is catered to capitalize off of Fastbond, then the hell with the Drake because I should already be squeezing my opponent's neck with something bigger, and at the very least I should have already cast a few spells that's just about to allow me to sl... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
